title: muthyAla chavikelO
sahitya:
mutyAla cavikelO mudamu mIraganu satyavantuDu sItA satitO callaganu
 
 carNam 1
 
addALa maNTapam bAmaru rAghavuni muddugAraga jUci munulella pogaDa

caraNam 2

dEva sudatulu paTTa divya jOtulanu pAvanuni guNamulanu pAdEru

caraNam 3

suralu sumamula vAna guriyimpa jEsi sarasijAkSuni jUci
santasilliganu

caraNam 4

rAga tALa mrdanga ravaLicE bAgA tyAgarAjavELa dayatO pADaganu
